trans-unit.source: Provides enumerated values that are used to set the <see langword="Cache-Control" /> HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于设置 <see langword="Cache-Control" /> HTTP 标头的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, go to RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请转到 RFC 2616： 超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1 上[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: In particular, for complete details, see Section 14.9 "Cache-Control" and Section 13, "Caching in HTTP."
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，有关完整详细信息，请参阅第 14.9 节"Cache-control"和第 13 节、"HTTP 中的缓存。"

trans-unit.source: `NoCache` does not send the common HTTP 1.0 request directive `Pragma: no-cache`.
trans-unit.target: `NoCache` 不会发送常见的 HTTP 1.0 请求指令`Pragma: no-cache`。
设置 <see langword="Cache-Control: no-cache" /> 标头。

trans-unit.source: Without a field name, the directive applies to the entire request and a shared (proxy server) cache must force a successful revalidation with the origin Web server before satisfying the request.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有字段名，则指令应用于整个请求，且在满足请求前，共享（代理服务器）缓存必须对原始 Web 服务器强制执行成功的重新验证。

trans-unit.source: With a field name, the directive applies only to the named field; the rest of the response may be supplied from a shared cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果有字段名，则指令仅应用于命名字段；响应的其余部分可能由共享缓存提供。

trans-unit.source: Sets <see langword="Cache-Control: private" /> to specify that the response is cacheable only on the client and not by shared (proxy server) caches.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see langword="Cache-Control: private" /> 以指定响应只能缓存在客户端，而不能由共享（代理服务器）缓存进行缓存。

trans-unit.source: Sets <see langword="Cache-Control: public" /> to specify that the response is cacheable by clients and shared (proxy) caches.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see langword="Cache-Control: public" /> 以指定响应能由客户端和共享（代理）缓存进行缓存。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the response is cached only at the origin server.
trans-unit.target: 指定响应仅缓存在源服务器上。

trans-unit.source: Clients receive a <see langword="Cache-Control: no-cache" /> directive but the document is cached on the origin server.
trans-unit.target: 客户机接收 <see langword="Cache-Control: no-cache" /> 指令，但文档是在原始服务器上缓存的。

trans-unit.source: Applies the settings of both <see cref="F:System.Web.HttpCacheability.Server" /> and <see cref="F:System.Web.HttpCacheability.NoCache" /> to indicate that the content is cached at the server but all others are explicitly denied the ability to cache the response.
trans-unit.target: 应用 <see cref="F:System.Web.HttpCacheability.Server" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Web.HttpCacheability.NoCache" /> 的设置指示在服务器上缓存内容，而对服务器以外的其他对象都显式否定其缓存响应的能力。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the response is cached at the server and at the client but nowhere else.
trans-unit.target: 指示响应只能在服务器和客户端缓存。

trans-unit.source: Proxy servers are not allowed to cache the response.
trans-unit.target: 代理服务器不能缓存响应。
